channel.title: curl on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in curl on Some Title

item.title: A site that converts curl commands into requests
item.description: It was convenient so I took notes https://curl.trillworks.com/ If you have the following curl curl -X POST'https://example.com/' \ - H'Content-Type: application/json' \ - d'{"key1": "value1", "key2": "value2"}' If you put this, it will be converted to the following import requests headers = { 'Content-Type':'application/json', } data ='{"key1": "value1", "key2": "value2"}' response = requests.post('https://example.com/login', headers=headers, data=data)
